title: Nokia XR20 is the latest HMD Global phone to receive Android 12
content:
Google released the final build of Android 12 in October of last year, and by the end of the year, many of the most popular Android smartphones were already updated. However, it’s taking some manufacturers longer than others to upgrade all their phones, and HMD Global has been slow to roll out Android 12 to

The post Nokia XR20 is the latest HMD Global phone to receive Android 12 appeared first on xda-developers.
